control.description: button overlay to avoid closing in dialog area

control.visible: String.IsEmpty(Player.Art(tvshow.clearlogo)) + String.IsEmpty(Player.Art(clearlogo)) + String.IsEmpty(Player.Art(poster)) + String.IsEmpty(Player.Art(tvshow.poster)) + String.IsEmpty(Player.Art(thumb)) + String.IsEmpty(MusicPlayer.Cover) + String.IsEmpty(Player.Art(thumb))
control.label: $VAR[IconMediaNotif]
